availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, and Parker County, Texas, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Matilda J. Copeland White in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on December 6, 1849. Father of Jacob White, L. White, James White, G. T. White, and Marion White. Farmer in Caldwell County 1850. Farmer in Parker County, Texas, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 354B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Texas, Parker County, Beat 3, p. 438.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Tennessee Precinct, p. 524B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 275.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Caldwell County Administrators Bonds, 1878-1899, p. 113.
